isis.stitle: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE AND LQ-5 BOBTAIL LIMITING VALVE - DISASSEMBLE - BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE

svcproc.title: BP-R1 BOBTAIL BRAKE PROPORTIONING RELAY VALVE
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 15for all items in parentheses.

caution.para: The BP-R1 may be lightly clamped in a bench vise during disassembly, however, over-clamping will cause damage to the valve and result in leakage and/or malfunction.

svcproc.para: If a vice is used, position the valve so that the vice jaws bear on the supply ports on opposing sides of the valve body.

step1.para: Remove all air fittings and plugs from valve.
Mark the relationship of the valve cover to the valve body, and if the valve is equipped with a mounting bracket, mark the relationship of the bracket to the cover.
While holding the exhaust cover (Item 4), remove and discard retaining ring (Item 3) that secures it to the body (Item 1).
Remove and discard the exhaust cover (Item 4) along with both O-rings (Items 5 and 6).
Remove and discard the valve spring (Item 7), valve retainer (Item 8), and the valve assembly (Item 9) from the body (Item 1).
Remove and retain the four capscrews (Item 10) that secure the cover (Item 2) to the body (Item 1).
Separate the cover (Item 2) from the body (Item 1), then remove and discard the sealing ring (Item 34) and O-ring (Item 11).
Remove and retain the relay piston (Item 12) from the body (Item 1).
Remove and discard O-ring (Item 13) from the relay piston (Item 12).
Remove and discard dust shield (Item 15) and the retaining ring (Item 14) from the valve cover (Item 2), then remove and retain the exhaust piston (Item 16).
Remove and discard the exhaust piston O-ring (Item 17) and the exhaust diaphragm (Item 18).
Remove and retain the service piston (Item 19) from the valve cover (Item 2), then remove and discard the service piston O-ring (Item 20).
Remove the spring (Item 21) and spring cage (Item 22) from the valve cover (Item 2). Discard the spring and retain the spring cage.
Remove and retain the blend back piston (Item 23) from the valve cover (Item 2), then remove and discard both O-rings (Items 24 and 25).
Remove and retain the proportioning piston (Item 27) from the valve cover (Item 2), then remove and discard both O-rings (Items 26 and 28).
While holding the inlet valve seat (Item 31) in place, remove and discard the retaining ring (Item 29) from the proportioning piston (Item 27).

Remove the inlet valve seat (Item 31), the inlet valve (Item 32), and the valve spring (Item 33) from the proportioning piston (Item 27), then remove and discard the O-ring (Item 30) from the valve seat (Item 31). Discard the valve and springs (Items 32 and 33) also.
Remove and discard the exhaust cover screw (Item 35) and the exhaust cover (Item 36).
